articles.title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures rise as TSMC's stellar earnings eclipse trade-war jitters
articles.description: Investors weighed corporate earnings against the escalating US-China trade war.
articles.content:
US stock futures rose on Thursday as chip giant TSMC's stellar earnings buoyed AI hopes, taking minds off fears of a prolonged US-China trade war stoked by President Trump.
